name: toggle-transaction-exclusion
description: Toggle transaction exclusion from the DB
author: Gareth Dyson <4315423+dysonic@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.dev: npm run zip && npm run s3 && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name toggleTransactionExclusion --s3-bucket dysonic-dev-misc --s3-key toggle-transaction-exclusion.zip --no-cli-pager
